data.author: Brian Ouellette

changelog.release_notes:
v1.5:

For phone where GPS is not working or disabled. You can now selection a Country and Postal Code for general weather information. This may break GPS settings until it is set to the on position when updated.

v1.4:

Small bug fixes. 
Support for Pebble 2.

v1.3:

Fixed Weather API Issue.
Fixed wrong F temperature.

v1.2:

Weather, Temp, Degrees, License Key update!

v1.1

Fix for SDK 3.x to display the face. Should now fix the not responding error! :D

data.description:
A recreation of a vintage watch from a popular burger joint. Jack's Moonlight will give you nightmares before your Christmas holiday. With the purchase of the license key, you can unlock additional features. Go into the watch face settings on your phone to purchase a license for $0.99 cents.

Features:

Bluetooth connection: When disconnected, the background color will go white.

Battery meter: When the battery is drained, the moon is be more of a crescent. There are five stages.

License Key Features:

Date and Temperature with a flick or tap of your wrist.

Get a backdrop of the current weather that includes clouds, rain, snow, lightning, and wind.

Ability to get weather data form OpenWeatherMap from either GPS settings or Country and Postal Code input. Some devices may not work with GPS and the use of Postal Code will yield general results.
 
If you do purchase a license key and do not receive the email, check your junk folder. If you still haven't received on, email me and I will have one sent to you. 

Thank you and enjoy!
